name: Amber Alert (David Scott)
description:
The Canadian maple syrup industry is in turmoil. With so many dissatisfied with the current state of affairs, a black market has emerged. There are scams left and right, and prices can vary wildly, but there is plenty of opportunity for profit for anyone looking to take advantage of the situation.

Stay on your toes, and be wary of who you trust. Good luck.

Created by David H. Scott

Roadmap

  • Music
  • Balancing

v1.1

v2.0
